name: part_012
file: tmp_【 ごちそうさまでした 】沙花叉クロヱ卒業ライブ【ホロライブ⧸沙花叉クロヱ】 [F9lbxgimNIE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_012.mov

scenes.description: MC section where the HoloX members share emotional words and banter before their final song together.
The HoloX unit performs the song 'Summertime Record'.

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Thank you so much!

subtitles.original: 本当にエモい。
subtitles.english: This is really emotional.

subtitles.original: エモいね。
subtitles.english: It is, isn't it?

subtitles.original: はいてないやついます、はいてないやついます。
subtitles.english: Someone isn't wearing them, someone isn't wearing them.

subtitles.original: ちょっと、はいてください！
subtitles.english: Hey, please put them on!

subtitles.original: 何で... 違うもん！
subtitles.english: Why... No, you're wrong!

subtitles.original: 何でこんな素敵な時に言わなきゃいけないの！
subtitles.english: Why do you have to say that at such a wonderful time!

subtitles.original: 違う、違う、やっぱ輝くのはうちらじゃなくて今日クロヱがいいかなと思って。
subtitles.english: No, no, I just thought today Chloe should be the one to shine, not us.

subtitles.original: よこせよ、よこせよ、マジで！
subtitles.english: Give it to me, give it to me, seriously!

subtitles.original: ちょっとその情緒感狙わないで！
subtitles.english: Hey, don't try to aim for that emotional vibe!

subtitles.original: 汚れなくていい、綺麗にきて、それ。
subtitles.english: You don't need to get dirty, come out beautifully in that.

subtitles.original: いや、本当にありがとね。もう...
subtitles.english: No, really, thank you. I mean...

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Thank you very much.

subtitles.original: ちょっとこれからのことも、ホロックス4人が頑張ってるところ見届けていきたいので。
subtitles.english: Since I want to continue watching over the four members of HoloX as they do their best...

subtitles.original: またこれからも、ホロックスとしても、そしてホロライブのメンバーとしても...
subtitles.english: From now on as well, as HoloX and as members of Hololive...

subtitles.original: 頑張ってください、応援してます。
subtitles.english: Please do your best, I'm rooting for you.

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Thank you so much!

subtitles.original: いや、これクロヱのさ、パート取り合いだね、これね。
subtitles.english: Man, this is gonna be a scramble for Chloe's parts, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 確かに。
subtitles.english: That's true.

subtitles.original: やめてよ、奪わないで！
subtitles.english: Stop it, don't take them!

subtitles.original: 手を挙げろ、手を挙げろ！
subtitles.english: Put your hands up, put your hands up!

subtitles.original: でも見たい。
subtitles.english: But I want to see it.

subtitles.original: いや、あれ全員で自分の名前言うでしょ、クロヱのところ。
subtitles.english: No, everyone will just say their own names in Chloe's parts.

subtitles.original: やってみる？
subtitles.english: Shall we try?

subtitles.original: ラプラス・ダークネス！ 高嶺ルイ！ 博衣こより！ 沙花叉クロヱ！ 風真いろは！
subtitles.english: Laplus Darknesss! Takane Lui! Hakui Koyori! Sakamata Chloe! Kazama Iroha!

subtitles.original: うるさいよ！
subtitles.english: You're so noisy!

subtitles.original: うるさい！ 一番でかい奴、そういうパートじゃないから！
subtitles.english: Be quiet! You with the loudest voice, that's not what that part is for!

subtitles.original: 今日は誰々のパートみたいな。
subtitles.english: Like, "Today is so-and-so's part."

subtitles.original: もう一日ずつさ、クロヱの声真似しながらしてね。
subtitles.english: Every single day, please do it while imitating Chloe's voice.

subtitles.original: やだもう！
subtitles.english: Oh, stop it!

subtitles.original: 辞めたら好き勝手やられる、本当に。
subtitles.english: They're really gonna do whatever they want once I leave.

subtitles.original: だからそれを見守ってて下さい。
subtitles.english: So please keep watching over that.

subtitles.original: はい、はい、見守ります。
subtitles.english: Yes, yes, we'll watch over it.

subtitles.original: やだ、好き勝手やられて...
subtitles.english: Geez, they're just doing whatever...

subtitles.original: いや、でも本当にありがとうございました。
subtitles.english: No, but really, thank you very much.

subtitles.original: こちらこそありがとうございました。
subtitles.english: The pleasure was ours, thank you.

subtitles.original: お疲れ様でした。
subtitles.english: Thank you for your hard work.

subtitles.original: 元気でね。
subtitles.english: Take care.

subtitles.original: 元気で行く！
subtitles.english: I'll stay healthy!

subtitles.original: 本当に今回も、あれですね、頑張ってくださいということで。
subtitles.english: Really, this time too, please do your best.

subtitles.original: 締めに掛かる感じやめて。
subtitles.english: Stop making it feel like we're wrapping up.

subtitles.original: そうだよ、まだあるよ、クロヱ。
subtitles.english: That's right, there's still more, Chloe.

subtitles.original: クロヱまだあるよ。
subtitles.english: Chloe still has more.

subtitles.original: うちら5人で最後の曲！
subtitles.english: The last song with the five of us!

subtitles.original: 悲しいこと言うな！
subtitles.english: Don't say such sad things!

subtitles.original: 頑張るよ、最後まで頑張るよ。
subtitles.english: I'll do my best, I'll do my best until the end.

subtitles.original: いや、でも本当にみんなでさ、せっかくのだしせーので入ろうよ。
subtitles.english: No, but really everyone, since it's a special song, let's start it on "Ready, go."

subtitles.original: せーので入ろうよ。
subtitles.english: Let's start it on "Ready, go."

subtitles.original: お願い。
subtitles.english: Please.

subtitles.original: せーので歌いたいよ。
subtitles.english: I want to sing it on "Ready, go."

subtitles.original: いいよ、いいよ。
subtitles.english: Alright, alright.

subtitles.original: じゃあ歌うんですよ、いきますよ。
subtitles.english: Well then, we're going to sing, here we go.

subtitles.original: 見てください、せーの！
subtitles.english: Please watch, ready, go!

subtitles.original: サマータイムレコード！
subtitles.english: Summertime Record!

subtitles.original:
サマータイムレコード
作詞作曲：じん
subtitles.english:
Summertime Record
Lyrics/Composition: Jin

subtitles.original: 昨日も今日も晴天で 入道雲を見ていた
subtitles.english: Yesterday and today were both clear, I was watching the thunderclouds

subtitles.original: 怠いくらいの快晴だ 終むろに目を閉じて
subtitles.english: The weather is almost lazily fine, I slowly close my eyes

subtitles.original: それはどうも簡単に 思い出せやしないようで
subtitles.english: It seems that won't be remembered so easily

subtitles.original: 年を取った現状に 浸ってたんだよ
subtitles.english: I was immersing myself in the fact that I've aged

subtitles.original: あぁ...
subtitles.english: Ah...

subtitles.original: 大人振った作戦で 不思議な合図立てて
subtitles.english: With a plan to act like adults, making a strange signal

subtitles.original: 「行こうか、今日も戦争だ」 立ち向かって手を取った
subtitles.english: "Let's go, today's another battle," we stood up and took each other's hands

subtitles.original: 理不尽なんて当然で 独りぼっち強いられて
subtitles.english: Unreasonableness is only natural, forced to be all alone

subtitles.original: 迷った僕は憂鬱に なりそうになってさ
subtitles.english: Lost, I was about to become melancholy

subtitles.original: 背伸びした空を分けて 滲む太陽に手を
subtitles.english: Dividing the sky I stretched for, my hand to the blurring sun

subtitles.original: 「君のせいだ」食いしばった
subtitles.english: "It's your fault," I gritted my teeth

subtitles.original: 孤独だったらおいでよ
subtitles.english: If you're lonely, come here

subtitles.original: 騒がしさも思い出して 生まれた感情さえも
subtitles.english: Remembering the noise too, even the emotions that were born

subtitles.original: 頭に浮かんでは萎んだ 幻のままかな
subtitles.english: Those that came to mind and withered away, will they remain illusions?

subtitles.original: 秘密基地に集まって 「楽しいね」って単純な
subtitles.english: Gathering at our secret base, saying "it's fun" was so simple

subtitles.original: あの頃を思い出して 話をしよう
subtitles.english: Remembering those days, let's talk

subtitles.original: 飛行機雲飛んでって 「眩しいね」って泣いていた
subtitles.english: The vapor trails flew by, we were crying saying "it's so bright"

subtitles.original: 君はどんな顔だっけ
subtitles.english: What kind of face did you have?

subtitles.original: なぜか、思い出せないな
subtitles.english: For some reason, I can't remember

subtitles.original: 痛いくらいの現実は 足早に駆け抜けた
subtitles.english: The reality, so much that it hurt, rushed past quickly

subtitles.original: 選んだ今日は平凡で 崩れそうになる
subtitles.english: The today I chose is so ordinary, I feel like I'm going to crumble

subtitles.original: 昨日も今日も...
subtitles.english: Yesterday and today...
